short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prompt Splitter is a browser extension that breaks down large prompts texts into small chunks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "ChatGPT Prompt Splitter" â€“ your seamless solution to streamline text input on the ChatGPT website! Tired of grappling with lengthy paragraphs? This browser extension is crafted to enhance your user experience by allowing you to effortlessly divide extensive text into bite-sized prompts.

Gone are the days of struggling to fit your thoughts into a single message. With ChatGPT Prompt Splitter, you can now break down large chunks of text into manageable portions, making communication smoother and more efficient. Simply install the extension, and a user-friendly interface will appear on the ChatGPT website, ready to assist you.
